input.sentences: the crew started out early one morning .
the captain did an excellant job of keeping the crew on course .
the ride back to shore included a delicious cup of coffee .
the crew finally found their land legs after dark . it was a long day !
output.sentences: It was a great day and we fished till we ran out of time.
We all did a great job at keeping the boat steady which was excellant.
The ride to the shore included some great refreshments.
It was nice to finally put our legs on land.
